title: 12 year-old boy dies in Sanborn, mother says shooting accidental
content:
SANBORN, ND (KFGO) - The Barnes County Sheriff's Office is investigating the shooting death of a 12 year-old boy.
Deputies were called to a home in Sanborn about 10 p.m. Sun. The boy's mother, in a facebook post, says the shooting was accidental. A shotgun was recovered.
The mother says her son was thoughtful, empathetic and loved his life. She says he would have turned 13 next week and was looking forward to his early birthday present, a BMX bike.
